Pros:Sound is incredible, which is obviously the most important thing. I turned the lower frequencies down just a tiny bit on my EQ, because I found the bass was causing the guitars (in death, black, melodeath, thrash metal) to be a little overshadowed and muddy. But with a small adjustment, it sounds perfect to my taste.The earcups are super comfortable, which is the 2nd most important thing.HB mode works really well, comparable to the active noise cancelling I've had with Bose in the past.The "listening" (whatever it's called that lets outside sound in) mode is also good.Cons:The main con is this: The vocal status announcements are LOUD and INTRUSIVE. I think they're a little overkill. But the worst offenders are when you turn HB on/off. The worst part of listening to music, is having a loud interruption that shouts "HELLBLOCKER (DE)ACTIVATED". The 2nd thing, which might be even more counterintuitive, is when you roll the volume down to zero, a LOUD voice booms MINIMUM VOLUME. C'mon, I literally am trying to make the volume go lower, I don't need a sudden, much louder than level-1 volume voice yelling at me. Imagine if every time you muted your TV, the TV announces "MUTING TV!" This is especially annoying, because I'm often in public, on a train or something, and I need to adjust my volume without looking at my phone, so I'd rather not be startled when I accidentally bottom out. Hopefully, an update can fix that. Or maybe you'll release an app to make adjustments or something.

Review.Titre: Excellent product, still in early launch
Review.Contenu: I have had the Heavys headphones for a few weeks now, and I haven't tested all the features yet, but I have been enjoying the headphones a great deal. I do think there are some drawbacks, they are a bit large for my head even in the tightest position (and my head is not small), and they do seem a little too bass-heavy, but they do still have a good enough response that makes metal, and actually other music (particularly some electronic stuff I happened across) shine. They even work well for spoken word content on YouTube. The Bluetooth connectivity seems to be extremely good, in fact too good. I live in a small apartment and the Heavys are paired with an iPad and a MacBook Pro. When I power them on, they will often connect to both if the MacBook isn't completely shut down even if the MacBook is dozens of feet away behind a wall. When this happens, I don't get audio on the iPad. I haven't tested the analog connectivity, or the USB-C connectivity, or the mic. They do seem to last a good long time on a single charge, and they feel like a premium and thoughtfully constructed product. It did take a along time for me to receive them but I'm generally pretty patient with Kickstarter projects because unforeseen things can and do happen. In all, I do recommend the product, but I would probably advocate for holding off until they are fulfilling orders more consistently, and for any pending firmware updates that may improve audio or connectivity.

Fit:The headphones offer a sleek design with a good balance of materials and textures. However, there is a noticeable tightness when wearing glasses, and the ear cups could benefit from a slight enlargement of 1-3mm to accommodate larger ears. The foam lacks sufficient padding for extended wear.Buttons:One area for improvement is the height of the play/volume control button compared to the adjacent buttons. This height difference is not significant, causing difficulty for users with larger fingers. It results in accidental clicks on smaller buttons or a challenge in gripping the center button due to overlap from the shells. It's recommended to increase the height of the center button, change its shape to an oval for improved usability, and make notches the shells around button placements.Audio:While the sound quality is excellent, there is room for enhancement. Adding support for (HIFI) Bluetooth codecs such as aptX Lossless and LDAC/LHDC would allow the headphones to utilize the potential of the eight drivers fully.Cable:The choice of material for the cable's outer jack is less than ideal. Additionally, the cable is too short, tends to tangle easily, and has a less secure connection to the headphones. This can lead to sound issues with even a slight cable tug. My listening experience changed drastically when I replaced the supplied cable with a balanced cable. The difference is night and day!In conclusion, the headphones offer a sleek design and good sound quality but have several areas for improvement, and addressing them would undoubtedly position the headphones as a competitive option with higher-priced headphones.

Review.Titre: Truly a 5 star product having been just launched.
Review.Contenu: Truly a 5 star product being a newly launched design. Giving 4 stars, as I believe in continual improvement. Keep going, and stand by the values that got you to where you are.What I Love (Pros):4 Drivers per ear, including 2 tweeters - This was my dream for a long time to have the sound stage capability that these headphones have. The foundation is here!Comfort - Yes, yes, yesButtons & Ergonomics - Nicely done, intuitive, excellent feedback from the controls.Noise Canceling - WOW......they nailed it. Some of the best noise canceling I've experienced, and I have A320 Bose for flying planes. I've been using these while mowing the lawn and using other yard products....absolutely amazing.Bluetooth - It connects to two devices, so when I forget to disconnect my phone or tablet I don't have to get up and find where the other device is to disconnect it.....how did you manage that? :). Bluetooth distance - Also wow.What I hope to see added & improved:Software/App to control features:I would like to be able to disable the bluetooth connected light, the only thing that stops me from using these in bed is that the light wakes up my wife.I'd like to be able to control the volume, or disable the "Power On" / "Hellblocker Activated". Love the metal voice, and it's cool as heck but it's a bit too loud. Equalizer: PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE :) I know Axle is a great sound engineer but everyone perceives sound a little differently, and unfortunately there is no standard when mixing music. I had to pay for and download an equalizer app, but it's not 100% compatible. I would love for the Heavys team to design and offer their own equalizer.

Review.Titre: A Promising Start for a new Brand!
Review.Contenu: Despite the delivery delays, they had a proactive communication regarding the whole shipping process, which was specially important during the custom duties.For a first in hands experience in the Headphones segment, the Heavys H1H sound a bit daunting when it comes to weight and size when compared with their peers. The jack input is a bit small to find when you are plugging in with your heaphones already set and it may take some time to search with your fingers until you find it.These are minor turnarounds when compared with the experience of the heaphones - they really live up to their name. The sound depth is amazing no matter what music you are listening to (atmospheric and ambient sounds are a really imersive experience) and the volume does not sound too agressive to your ears. Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) is also available, but the earcups are so robust and good that passive sound isolation is self sufficient for the majority of your use scenarios.In short, the H1H are a good start for a newly created company and a great option if you want to explore beyond the brands already established in the market. The Heavys are also developing an equalizer application that will allow you to adjust your sound settings in the future and allow to explore further the potential output of your headphones - give them a try!

All that development paid off in a set of headphones that was just as described.  The sound is clear and full, obviously suitable for heavy music but good for listening to any style.  The built-in Hellblocker noise cancellation works well for keeping rumbly sources from interfering and I could see these being a good option when traveling.  The bluetooth range is excellent, and having a passive option is really nice too, as well as the ability to use them as a DAC to plug directly into the computer.  They're also very comfortable to wear for extended periods, and they seem to have a long battery life.  The voice when changing options is a nice touch too.

Heavy helped me on every stage of the order process and these headphones are such a pack a punch, Im using them everyday listening to all types of metal. I like it when I find music that can make them tremble as well as having goosebumps when they do, it makes the listening experience so much awesome!

These headphones are really great! The sound quality is exceptional. Not only for hard rock and heavy metal, but for any other musical genre. Materials seem durable and sturdy and they are comfortable to wear.

Review.Titre: After trying my sons I bought a pair…
Review.Contenu: After trying my sons I bought a pair within five minutes. Wireless, brilliant sound, fantastic battery life, easy control and pairing. The only negative was waiting to get them… Would be more than happy to recommend them and already have.

The Heavy’s experience is unlike any I’ve had, since I started living in my headphones at a young age. You can hear each and every aspect, as it is intended, and not distorted. 666/10, would recommend 🤘
Great Customer service Headphones are the best, I’ve ever had. And being a Rock Musician I have had, and used several different types of headphones.

A great dealer with a new, innovative product at an amazing price-performance ratio. The buyer is always informed about the current status of the purchase. There is also detailed information about the company, the operation and the development of the product. The Heavys headphones have an amazing powerful and detailed sound. Punch and range are awesome. Bluetooth connectivity is very quick. Wearing comfort and operation are great. But the headphones are big, so I will not wear them outside, but that’s just a matter of taste. With a head circumference less than 56cm the headband is at it‘s minimum position and shaky while headbanging. In total these headphones can easily keep up with much more expensive headphones from known big brands. So my overall result is 8,5 of 10 points, just based on the sound 10 of 10 points. Well done heavys!!!

The entire experience from pre-order to delivery has been exceptional. Regular updates were provided for shipment dates and once shipped it was delivered in a timely manner.Now the product itself is spectacular. The sound quality is everything promised and I would highly recommend these to anyone who may be on the fence about purchasing them!
Best headphones 🎧 i've ever owned . Nothingface rips! R.I.P. Matt Holt.

I have had these for about 2 weeks now and I have to vouch for these headphones. The sound quality is beyond any I have owned in the past. Hell blocker mode puts you into a solid sound proof room where you can hear each song on a different level. The beauty of these headphones it allows you to hear the imperfections of each song which gives you a different take of the actual songs and the true talent that the musicians have. I feel these headphones are not just for heavy metal, they make EDM, pop and rock sound solid. The bass really stands put and is smooth with very nice clears and mids. They don't have the option for modifying the low mid and high range at this time but I don't feel that is a deal breaker for me. Over all for the price these headphones are worth it in my opinion but I'd commend you to try them for yourselves.

Review.Titre: Heavy Headphones Are Great to Listen to Heavy Metal and Other Types of Music
Review.Contenu: The headphones were designed to listen to heavy metal. Thus, the name. Heavy metal does sound good on them. I have also used them to listen to pop, alternative, EDM, and other music. They sound good through the headphones too. I can hear the various elements of the music through them. The headphones are really well built. They are a bit heavy in weight so I wouldn't recommend them for wearing on a daily walk or when you are moving around. They are best used when you are sitting at home listening to your favorite music. I use them when they are connected through Bluetooth to my phone. They have also included a jack and cable in case a person wants to physically connect the headphones to a sound source. This is a nice touch as many companies have done away with physical connections.

These are easily the best headset for music I've ever owned. Clarity, thundering bass, outstanding sound quality overall. Plus, hearing that hilarious voice saying, "Hellblocker terminated" give me a laugh every time.

Review.Titre: Throw out your old headphones, ya wont need em anymore.
Review.Contenu: I had my doubts upon pre-ordering the HEAVY'S headphones as i been let down time and time again by companies saying they have the most clear and loud headphones on the market just to be disappointed and out hundreds of dollars in my hard earned money. Not anymore...these headphones were the best purchase i made in audio. I've had the major top brands, from traditional cup earphones to earbuds,  and HEAVY'S is the one clear winner. The headband and cups are strong and durable, the hardshell case offers great protection when not in use, the battery life is perfect, and overall construction is unlike anything else ive had for personal audio. No matter what genre you like (even though they are designed for heavy metal) the sound quality / clarity and loudness of these are perfect for any genre you enjoy. From death metal, grindcore, hardcore punk, all the way to country, hip hop, rap, classical, spoken word, jazz / blues, these bad boys deliver EXACTLY what you want in headphones. The bluetooth connection is simple and easy and even make great headphones for gaming and taking phone calls. The battery life exceeded my expectations even at high volume. If you're looking for durability, clarity, loudness, and good battery life - look no further. HEAVY's is all you need for personal audio to be fully immersed in the sounds you enjoy the most in life. Take your audio pleasures to a new level with HEAVY'S.

Review.Titre: I love the sound of the Heavys…
Review.Contenu: I love the sound of the Heavys headphones.But I found that although you advertise LHDC support on your website, my Nothing Phone (2) doesn't detect it on Heavys but it works perfectly with LHDC on Nothing Ear (2) earbuds on the same phone.

The headphones are great, well constructed. The sound is great, the battery life is great. Slightly missing on the bass side, but should be fixed with the heavys app, or directly on the phone adjusting equalization.

Took a bit of a wait, but it was worth the wait. It's so comfortable. Especially wearing for long periods of time, I've had experiences where the head band bothers my head. Quality is great. Everything feels solid, and I absolutely love the case that it came with. Thank you guys!

They sound amazing! I did a comparison to all of my wireless headphones and earbuds. These are definitely superior to anything I've used in the past! My quest to find the best wireless over the ear headphones may be over!!

Review.Titre: Highly Recommend for all music types
Review.Contenu: Sound is great, comfort is great, battery life is exceptional. These are my new every-day headphones for all types of music and couldn't be happier to Kickstart these. Well worth the money!

Greatest pair of headphones I've ever owned or heard, amazing immersive sound, punchy bass, great treble, but the mids are the best, also the noise cancelation is PHENOMENAL, would strongly recommend, definitely worth every penny!
Great sound quality. Very comfortable. Controls took a little getting used to for me. Decent noise reduction. Only thing I am missing is a method to update the firmware.
Worth the wait and worth every penny. Whether you listen to "Nothing Else Matters" by Metallica or "Deathbound" by Get The Shot, you won't be disappointed. 🤘🤘🤘
Hell yes these headphones are amazing! I am hearing stuff in songs that I've never heard before. Highly recommend

Review.Titre: Good quality product, good communication from company.
Review.Contenu: Product has excellent quality. I was a Kickstarter and the order was delayed a few times, but there was excellent communication throughout the process.

Review.Titre: A great gift for someone special to me
Review.Contenu: They were a gift to my girlfriend and she's told me how much she loves them so I think you guys did a fantastic job. I regret not getting myself a pair in pre-order there 1000% worth it.

I have seen these headphones for a while now in ads. I was always skeptical of them. Finally got them and they're the real deal. They may not meet audiophile standards, but for everyday users, these headphones are excellent and sound great out of the box. There is no app to adjust the equalizer yet, but I believe there is one in the works. I love these headphones and use them daily. I use them for gaming and YouTube as well and they sound great. Highly recommend.
Just got mine today it's amazing the sound is so clear I can focus on any instrument without a problem. It's also easy to operate so that's nice as well

I was skeptical . . . at first.  Now I'm a believer.  These are what I was looking for in a pair of headphones.First off, I'm finally getting the volume I was missing in other headphones.  It's such a relief knowing that I don't have to max out the volume and still be wanting more.Secondly, they sound GOOD!  Really good!  Having said that, do I wish that there was an app with an EQ?  Yes, I do.  I love having options and sadly, these don't provide any.  Hopefully that will be rectified in the near future.Another concern is the waterproof/water resistant rating.  As far as I know, they don't have one.  Meaning, don't wear them in the rain or working out.  Even walking my dog during the afternoon can make me sweat, and I'm wary of wearing these.Other than these two gripes, these headphones are perfect for me.  Due to an allergy to nickel, I can't wear wireless earbuds without developing severe ear infections, so headphones are basically my only option.  And these deliver.  Big time.

Took a while to receive mine. But wow they are super high quality. Great for any kind of music but of course I had to crank morbid angel first. Also they are super comfortable right out the box. My absolute favorite feature is the volume knob! Oh that knob feels so nice gives me retro vibes. Only thing I didnt like was the voice when you power it on and off

The whole shipping process went smoothly and the goods were well packed. The parcel tracking was a little odd, but that's more a thing of the parcel company. I highly recommend Heavys and their products.

Review.Titre: It was late the answer of my purchase
Review.Contenu: It was late the answer of my purchase, I had to write to the company to know if my order was successful. At the end the waiting valued. I’m really enjoying the sound, it’s beyond what I expect
The pure raw power I get when I put those headphones on. I love the Hellblocker one of my favorite additions. But the most favorite I have is the quality of sound played through them.

took forever to show up, but I preordered so I knew that they were going to take a while. They were very transparent about their process of building and shipping and they sent me updates so I never doubted that they would show up. now that I have then they’re amazing ! worth the wait and the money

Review.Titre: Great experience from kickstarter to the headphones I now enjoy daily
Review.Contenu: The whole experience through KickStarter was great; the company kept providing updates throughout the process. The amount of care that went into the process and keeping the backers updated was superb. Release units in batches, incorporating feedback, and improving the product was an excellent approach and the quality shows.

So in a way it’s more the fault of the usps, but I still have not received my pair yet. I will say that I never received a tracking number from you guys until it was too late. I’m currently working with your staff to resolve this situation.Edit: worked with the fine staff to get the situation resolved. Thanks
Heavys are METAL! comfortable, amazing sound quality, and a lot of great control options right at your fingertips. The best part though is the voice. It's so awesome.

Review.Titre: Always quick to respond to inquiries
Review.Contenu: Always quick to respond to inquiries. I've had some issues getting the shells I ordered, but they always answer me the next day. Very professional. And the headphones are amazeballs!!

I needed a few weeks to give an honest opinion and damn… these headphones truly bring metal to life. Especially watching a music video. I cannot be more impressed and happy to own a pair of these masterpieces. HEAVYS brings a sort of live concert feel to your pocket. They are also very comfortable and seem to be very durable and have a nice weight to them. They don’t feel cheap in your hand. There are only 2 issues I have with these headphones. 1. The audible recording you get when you turn them on and when you turn on the “hell blocker” noise cancellation. While the deep menacing voice it rather cool it does get bothersome after a while and I wish there were a way to turn it off. 2. The active noise cancellation itself is not that powerful. It does help quiet some unwanted white noise while jamming out to your favorite set list or band, but at the same time it just isn’t powerful enough to block out background noise and nearby conversation. Overall, these headphones crushed it. I’d give them a solid 4.5 out if 5. Definitely worth the wait, the hype, and the money!!

Review.Titre: I had been looking forward to these…
Review.Contenu: I had been looking forward to these Heavys for a good minute, and they did not disappoint. Super comfy, amazing sound; they really delivered on all of their promises. Overall I'm stoked on my Heavys

I bought those headphones after a very unsatisfactory experience with expensive Bluetooth earbuds that I had to buy to compensate for the lack of mini-jack port in my new phone. I hated them, they kept falling, the sound was crap, cutting when I ate/drank etc.. I was so p****, I decided to try those Heavys instead, even though they weren't out. I simply stopped listening to music for 8 months.And then they arrived...I'm immensely satisfied by those headphones and have talked about them all around me.It's crazy the way you can hear all kinds of details in the music that you just couldn't hear before.Plus, even though I use them every day, I need to charge them once or twice a week. I've used them on the plane and at the gym and the Active noise control is awesome. Love them, and I'll have to buy a set for my GF since she uses them all the time too.Well done metalheads.
There was a problem with shipping Usps lost the headphones. Great customer service they took care of it and sent a replacement pair out fast.
From start to finish, heavy’s has kept in constant contact with me and keeping me in the loop on each stage of development. It was a long wait but DEF well worth it!

Headphone that really sound how they should!  Love hearing songs how they were meant to be heard vs just an bass boost or variable eq settings.  These headphones are built like a tank, sound wonderful and the battery life is great!  Love em so much I have two pairs in my household!
These are the best headphones I've ever had, the vocals sounds amazing, the balance of frequencies is perfect, and the volume so much louder than the others. 10/10.

Review.Titre: The explosion of sound will not disappoint.
Review.Contenu: I didn't have to wait too long to receive the headphones, and I've been enjoying them for days now. The sound is incredible. I have no regrets about buying this product!

Review.Titre: The best headphones i ever had!!!
Review.Contenu: These are the best headphones I have ever had. The sound is amazing!!!!

Review.Titre: The only thing I can say is that…it sounds very good 🤘🏽
Review.Contenu: The only thing I can say is that listening to heavy metal with my heavys headphones 🎧 is a unique experience.. each sound is completely detailed and I enjoy it a lot.. 🤘🏽🤘🏽
These headphones go above and beyond what I was expecting. They bring out pitches and sounds in songs that I have never heard before. Rock on Heavy's Family!

Review.Titre: Heavy by name, Heavy in sound!
Review.Contenu: The BEST headphones, the ONLY headphones you need to listen to the best music out there. I was a little sceptical about these headphones when I saw the Kickstarter campaign, but I have been blown away with everything they have to offer and am so happy I backed them.The comfort, the style, the sound!Obviously when buying headphones, the first thing you want is the best, clearest quality, and loudest sound and Heavys deliver 200% on that. I have listened to rock/metal from the 70s to the current day to get an idea of the range and quality these headphones offer and am hearing things I hadn't before on songs I've listened to a million times. The comfort is another key aspect and because they are so robust and strong it makes them probably slightly heavier than other headphones, the padding/cushioning makes them incredibly comfy on the top of the head and around the ears which negates the slight heaviness. I've had these headphones for 3 months nearly and used them every day for at least 30 minutes up to 3 hours and the padding has kept its shape.If anyone is considering buying a pair or two or three, of Heavys headphones, I cannot recommend them enough, you will not be disappointed.

Review.Titre: The sound quality is amazing and the…
Review.Contenu: The sound quality is amazing and the headphones themselves have a great solid feel. I particularly like the voice that's used to indicate it's on and other features.
Great tone and volume.Wouldnt mind a tone knob tho
